department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Miniature cup, tan jade with reddish brown markings; L.2 1/2 in., H. 1 1/4in.  Peach-shaped cup with pointed spout at one end and dragon peering backwards over edge at opposite end.  Second dragon carved in relief near base.  Peach is symbol of longevity so perhaps cup was a gift for a birthday or anniversary.
title: Miniature Cup
